headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Discounts
content:
Don’t let envy get in your way: there’s a grab-bag of discounts on offer this week that’ll help you climb the social ladder, whether it’s 40% off the Master Penthouse Suite atop the Diamond and all its Customizations and Add-Ons, or a selection of vehicles that are sure to turn heads.

- Pegassi Torero - 30% Off
- Grotti Itali GTO - 40% Off
- Nagasaki Stryder - 40% Off
- Lampadati Komoda - 40% Off

And more! Check out the Rockstar Newswire for more details.
